text: thæcring phu khea seafa læa phu khea mar wah nan pen swn hnung cak brrda kheruxnghmay khx ngxallxh dangnan phu dı pra kx bphithi xacy hrux xu m reaa h n bay tu llxh k mimi bap dı «kæ khea thi ca dein wnweiyn pi ma n phukhea thang sxng nan læa phu dı prakxb khwam di doy smakhr cı læw næ nx nxallxh nan khux phuthrng khxbcı læa phuthrng rxbru
